Bindr is a virtual library where you can study together with people from all around the world, it helps you stay focused and stop procrastinating when you have to get work done.

With this extension you will be able to jump into a study session with only 1 click to boost your productivity and meet new people.

If you are new to Bindr:

Bindr is a platform which is similar to being in a library where you go to focus on your work. You can join study sessions with people from all around the world. In the sessions mics are off to make sure you donâ€™t disturb each other.

You will see others in the video call, where everyone is focusing on their own work while holding each other accountable. We recommend you to turn on your camera to feel more accountable.

Feel free to send messages in the group chat to motivate each other:)

Stop procrastinating and join a session now!
